data.oai_dc:dc: Marsh sediment porewater nutrient concentrations from Spartina sp. and Typha sp. sites along the Parker River, MA.

Marsh sediment porewater nutrient concentrations [NH4+, NO3-, DOC, TDN] and salinity are reported from Spartina sp. and Typha sp. sites along the Parker River, MA. Porewater peeper ploes are used for collection and the poles are located in the vicinity of the marsh water table sites for the Railroad and Typha sites.
